name: Lines 98 - Color Balls Classic
description:
One of the most popular puzzle game ever, now on iPhones & iPad with beautiful interface.

Easy to play, Hard to master!

Main Features of Lines Mobile:
+ Great Interface and exiting graphic and sound effects.
+ Game Images inspired from the classic games
+ 7 ball colors and 2 modes of 2x2 and line 5 as the original Lines on PC.
+ Save recents game to play later
+ All screen type are supported

Challenge yourself and share your highscore records with friends!
publishers: CAT VIET SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT & MEDIA JSC
